body.name: SUNMORY Arc Floor Lamp, Modern Floor Lamp with Romote Control and Stepless Dimmable Bulb, Metal Standing Lamps with Hanging Lampshade for Living Room, Bedroom, Office (Black)
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 10 hrs 54 mins
FREE delivery Monday, February 19. Order within 10 hrs 54 mins
features: 【Stepless Dimmable 】SUNMORY's new tall lamp supports step-less dimming for color temperature and brightness. The 9W bulb is paired with the remote control, then you only need to select the appropriate color temperature and brightness suiting your needs. There are also set modes offering various scenes like: reading, feeding, working and night light modes.

【Remote Controll and Foot Switch 】This bright lamp adopts a combination remote control & foot switch, assuring convenience for daily life. Imagine the ease of the foot switch when you have your hands full with your coffee and daily schedule! Or imagine positioning the lamp slightly out of reach but perfectly positioned for its sole purpose of perfect lighting, how ideal is a remote control? Both children and adults can easily turn on the LED bulb Lamp by their own way.

【Sturdy Safe Heavy Base】Made of high-quality metal and weighted with sand, the base is sturdy and tip-resistant. Effectively prevent the shaking of the indoor lamp, the construction prevents shaking and accidental tipping by anyone including children. Whether it is placed in the living room or the bedroom, it is very safe and convenient.

【Rotable Lampshade&Magnet Adsorption Function】The SUNMORY lampshade can be rotated horizontally or vertically to provide illumination as needed. The remote control has magnetic function and can be placed on the metal bracket of the boho chic lamp, which is convenient for you to quickly find the remote control at any time.

【Easy to Assemble】There will be a user manual of SUNMORY corner lamp in our package after purchase, which introduces the specific installation method of funky light according to the video, and it doesn't take too long to complete the installation. If you have any dissatisfaction or questions after receiving the package, please feel free to contact us, and we will reply to any questions you have at any time.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Previous page Every home is a little world, light and warmth belong to you. We are committed to exploring the harmonious unity of science and nature, practicality and beauty. Not only bring you convenience but also decorate your home. Next page 1 Lamp for living room 2 Lamp for bedroom 3 Lamp for studyroom

4 Different modes Our lights have four pre-set modes, you only need to press the corresponding button to achieve the appropriate light. Stepless color temperature The color temperature can be adjusted arbitrarily from 3000K-6000K, from warm light to cold light, there is always a light that you like. Brightness adjustable The brightness can be adjusted from 5% to 100%, and you can always find the brightness that suits you best.

Remote control We have equipped the floor lamp with remote control, which can greatly improve the convenience of use and increase the joy of life. 1 Hour timer Our floor lamp has a 1-hour timer function, which is especially suitable for use before going to bed, turn on the 1-hour timer before going to sleep, no need to worry about forgetting to turn off the light, and you can sleep peacefully. Saving space Our floor lamp is slim and does not take up space. It can be placed in a narrow area such as beside the sofa, the corner, the bedside, etc.

A variety of functions Our remote control has many functions, once you start using it, you will be amazed and fall in love with it. Packing list We have included all the necessary parts, you can use this floor lamp immediately once it is assembled. Easy to assemble It usually takes less than 5 minutes to complete the installation without any tools, even children can complete the installation independently.

LED bulb Our LED bulbs are not only energy efficient and durable but also adjustable in color temperature and brightness Adjustable angle The angle of the shade is adjustable to direct the light in the direction you want. Havey Base The weighted base greatly improves the stability of the floor lamp. Foot switch You can also use the foot switch to turn them on and off the light, it can free your hands.

Light your home SUNMORY is obsessed with providing high-quality lighting and furniture designed for a cozy life. We work to make design inclusive, simple, elegant, and available for various living spaces as well as promoting to light up your life. How to install？ Just put every part together. Only takes 5 minutes, and no tools are required.
Sending you festive greetings and the gift of illumination this Christmas. May your arc floor lamp brighten your holidays and fill your home with the warmth of the season."

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp for the price with excellent customer service.
reviews.reviewText: The lamp was easy to put together and came with a light bulb and remote. The base is weighted and even so that the lamp stands evenly, no leaning to one side. The pole seems sturdy. I would have preferred a larger lamp shade but that's my personal preference. The different light settings are nice however the remote only works with the light bulb that comes with the lamp.I had a question and reached out to the company and they were fantastic to deal with!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This is a nice lamp at a good price.
reviews.reviewText: I was surprised when the box came because it was so small. But the design for this is really well,thought out. It was easy to assemble looks nice and works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Remote didn't sync but company sent a replacement
reviews.reviewText: The lamp looks nice and was easy to assemble. The bulb turned on using the floor switch but the remote would not sync. I reached out to the customer service email on the assembly guide and they sent a new remote and bulb to me immediately, which fixed the issue. It is now controllable with the remote and I can change the brightness and color temperature.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Lots of cool features! Love this lamp!
reviews.reviewText: This lamp was a very pleasant surprise at how cool it is for the price! It was easy to assemble, as the cord was already threaded through the sections that go between the base and the shade. The coolest feature is the remote!!! Not only can you control the brightness of the light, but you can also change the "color" (kelvin) of it! You can adjust it from a very soft golden glow to a bright blue white color with just the press of a button. There are also several pre-set colors for reading, computer use as well as midnight feedings of a baby. And the remote is also MAGNETIC!! You can stick it to the 'shaft' of the lamp so you don't misplace it! The shade has the look of linen and is a wonderful addition to our beach house.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for my needs
reviews.reviewText: I wanted to set up a reading nook. This lamp is perfect. It makes me want to read. Right size. Love the remote! I can choose the perfect lighting ambiance. Easy to put together too.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 16, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love the ease of using the remote and all the different settings for lighting type and the dimming feature. The only thing that might cause a slight annoyance is if the bulb stops working you need to order a bulb and remote from the seller, it is not on Amazon and you cannot just purchase a regular bulb at the store. The good news is, when my bulb stopped working, their customer service team was on it. I had a replacement within a couple days.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 14, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great lamp and great customer service!
reviews.reviewText: I love his lamp. Having the options to control the brightness and light color with a remote control is a very nice feature. I bought it to read and do homework on my bed and I love that I can toggle the shade direction to point the light directly where I need it be a bit brighter. Unfortunately, a couple months in to owning the lamp, the bulb was malfunctioning and i had to switch out to a new bulb that no longer gave me the option to use the remote. I contacted customer service for the company and told them of the issue and they immediately sent me out a new bulb and remote, free of charge. The lamp is working perfectly again. 10/10 recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Amazing Customer Service
reviews.reviewText: We bought two of these for our living room and they are perfect! I love that they dim and have different types of lighting so we can change it when we don’t want it so bright. The lamps were easy to put together and look great in our space!After about 6 months of use, one of the bulbs died in one lamp. While you can replace the bulb with any light bulb, the remote does not work with any bulb because it is linked to the specific one it was packaged with. I contacted the company about this and they sent a new lightbulb and remote immediately that arrived in less than a week. I would recommend this product and company to anyone.
Batalle mucho para poder agregarla Alexa, luego se desprogramo sola y ya no pude agregarla de nuevo, ahora a veces prende y a veces no, muy mala experiencia
Leyendo las reseñas mencionaban que no llegaba con control remoto y en mi caso no fue así, SI llega con control remoto, es fácil de armar, sobretodo la pantalla. Esta incrieble y se ve super bien

Meine Lampe hatte den Kontakt zur Fernbedienung verloren und die Gebrauchsanweisung habe ich nicht mehr. Trotz geringer Erwartung habe ich die Firma angeschrieben und einen prima Support erhalten. Hier der Schriftverkehr (Auszug) mit Lösung:Guten Tag, bei dieser Lampe reagiert die Glühbirne nicht mehr auf die Fernbedienung. Kann ich bei Ihnen eine Ersatzglühbirne bekommen, ggf. mit Fernbedienung?passen Sie bitte die Fernbedienung gemäß den folgenden Schritten erneut an die Glühbirne an.1. Schalten Sie die Lampe mit dem Fußschalter ein und prüfen Sie, ob Sie sie mit der Fernbedienung ausschalten können. Wenn Sie es ausschalten können, funktioniert die Fernbedienung ordnungsgemäß.2. Wenn die Fernbedienung das Licht nicht ausschalten kann, drücken Sie etwa 5 Sekunden lang die Ein-/Aus-Taste auf der Fernbedienung, bis die Glühbirne zu blinken beginnt. Dann funktioniert die Fernbedienung.Kann man die Lampe außerdem normal einschalten, indem man auf den Fußschalter tritt?Die Lampe lässt sich mit dem Fußschalter ein- und ausschalten. An der Fernbedienung leuchtet eine kleine Leuchtdiode auf, wenn man die Schalter betätigt. Die Glühbirne reagiert auf keinen der Schalter, und bei Betätigen der Ein-/Austaste über 5 Sekunden oder länger ebenfalls nicht.Ja, die Lampe, die Sie bei uns gekauft haben, ist tatsächlich eine ARC-Stehlampe.Könnten Sie in Ihrem Fall bitte auch versuchen, zuerst die Fernbedienung zu dekodieren und sie dann gemäß den detaillierten folgenden Anweisungen erneut zuzuordnen?DekodierungsprozessSchritt 1: Schalten Sie die Lampe mit dem Fußschalter ein.Schritt 2: Drücken Sie den Fußschalter 10 Mal. Wenn die Glühbirne blinkt, ist die Dekodierung erfolgreich.Pairing-Prozess1. Schalten Sie die Lampe nach der Dekodierung mit dem Fußschalter aus und wieder ein.2. Drücken Sie lange die Ein-/Aus-Taste auf der Fernbedienung (ca. 5 Sekunden). Wenn das Licht blinkt, ist die Kopplung erfolgreich.

reviews.reviewTitle: Lampadaire de 160cm parfait dans un salon ou chambre
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. Emballé efficacement dans une boîte compacte, lampadaire parfaitement conçu, facile à assembler sans outils en moins de 10 minutes, piles et ampoule incluses, la télécommande fonctionne parfaitement. j'apprécie le fait que la télécommande soit aimantée pour que vous puissiez la coller sur la lampe ! c'est un Excellent produit avec un éclairage puissant avec un maximum de réglage en couleur et en intensité avec des modes prédéfinis aussi, une notice claire.
me gusto la lampara pero estaba incomplreto ,tuve que mandar hacer una 'pantalla que en Mexico es caro,hacer cita para su devolucion es aun mas dificil per nesacitaba la lampara asi que me lo quede .
